ygData.subject: RE: Mask of Deception
ygData.msgSnippet: Casters are the dark stepchildren of Neriak anyway. As a newborn, my wizard was Apprehensive to the guards and even to his OWN guild!!! Since its almost
ygData.messageBody:
Casters are the dark stepchildren of Neriak anyway. As a newborn, my wizard
was
"Apprehensive" to the guards and even to his OWN guild!!! Since its almost
impossible to raise faction with Neriak. (There's a rogue quest you can do
at
VERY low levels. I don't know how far up it will take you) It can be quite a
bit easier to go off and shoot your faction with Neriak, preferring instead
to
get better prices elsewhere by one of the faction-gaining means in game.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 5 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Solusek Ro (Qeynos Aqueduct
System)

>-----Original Message-----
>From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 1:13 PM
>To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mask of Deception
>
>
>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
><shakes head in wonderment>
>
>Am I reading this right? You have a dark elf enchanter on a PvP teams
>server that is 'renegade'??? What next? Let me guess, your enchanter does
>not use magic but fites with melee weapons only? What's the point?
>
>Puzzled,
>
>Sylly
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 2:57 PM
>To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mask of Deception
>
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Actually it does affect faction. It takes away your basic racial modifiers
>and sets them for Dark elf. However, just like any other dark elf if you
>killed a lot of crushbone orcs or Nektulous Guards you will have lowered
>your faction as much as any dark elf who did the same thing. My dark elf
>enchanter on Tallon is kos in Neriak because I'm Agnostic and
>spent a lot of
>time in Crushbone killing Orcs. I can enter Felwithe without an illusion
>though.
>
> Kit
>
>
